programme.desc: Part one of two. Best-selling mystery writer PK Todd and her accountant are gunned down outside a restaurant. Miraculously, Todd survives but her companion is mortally wounded, prompting Briscoe and Green to launch a murder inquiry and discover the culprit's real target. However, they soon find themselves mixed up in a deadly case of jealousy and betrayal. Guest starring Ruthie Henshall and Tom Berenger

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The seemingly straightforward murder of a stockbroker plunges Briscoe and Green into the murky world of insider-trading and blackmail, as they learn that the victim led a seedy double life. However, their investigations take on a new dimension when the suspected killer is himself bumped off by a professional hitman. Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin star

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The murder of a white teenager in Harlem seems like an open-and-shut case - until two patrol officers are implicated in the crime. As tensions between residents and investigating officers mount, the Mayor puts pressure on Schiff to make an example of the cops, hoping it will be enough to satisfy ADA McCoy. Drama, starring Steven Hill

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Van Buren orders Briscoe and Green to reinvestigate unsolved cases, starting with the murder of a teenager 20 years previously. However, they discover much of the evidence gathered at the time has vanished, and the detective in charge of the case may have pursued an innocent man to protect the real culprit. An unexpected confession allows the case to end up in court again, but legal trickery makes a conviction an unlikely prospect

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A man with a history of violence is arrested for the murder of his son's school ice-hockey coach, but pleads mitigating circumstances. Helped by a glib defence lawyer, he claims that he committed the crime while suffering from a previously unknown mental condition he calls 'sports rage'

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green investigate the discovery of four bodies in a jeweller's shop. Suspicion soon falls on the husband of one of the victims, who is revealed to have changed his identity to escape a shady past. The shop's security tapes are subsequently discovered in his flat, but the defendant surprises everyone by insisting on representing himself in court - and makes a big impression on the jury

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs and McGee head to Alaska while the rest of the team works at home to uncover the conspiracy behind the serial killer

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team investigates the death of a Navy commander whose body suddenly explodes before Jimmy can examine it

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The officers investigate the death of a beloved commander who trained some of the top athletes in the country. Mark Harmon stars

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: The team is faced with a lengthy list of potential suspects while investigating the murder of a magazine editor whose abrasive personality won him many enemies as well as friends. The case takes a turn for the worse when one of the victim's colleagues is also killed, but the detectives are able to link his death to the Russian mafia. Crime drama, starring Jeff Goldblum and Leslie Hendrix

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson hopes justice will be served as child abductor Lewis Hodda goes on trial. However, when a plea deal is rejected, Barba must rely on decades-old evidence to make his case, and faces off against former SVU colleague Dr Huang. Crime drama, guest starring Tom Sizemore

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A high-school student succumbs to the flirtations of an attractive female teacher, and begins to plan a clandestine encounter. However, he quickly finds himself in a far more terrifying situation. Crime drama, starring Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A covert identity created for one of Gibbs' undercover cases 20 years previously resurfaces after a murder victim is found to be using the alias. Meanwhile, Bishop becomes anxious at the thought of having to work incognito in the future. Starring Mark Harmon and Emily Wickersham

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A US Navy lieutenant is murdered at the Defence Logistics Agency, while visitings the office of an admiral currently away at sea. As the team investigates the scene of the crime, they realise a rare painting found in the admiral's office is actually an elaborate fake placed there after the killing, replacing the stolen original. As the quest to locate the missing artwork gets under way, the agents realise they need the help of an expert. Luckily, Tony's con-artist father has returned to town, having broken up with his fiancee, and is on hand to provide expert advice as the hunt for the killer takes them into the shady world of the black market. Guest starring Robert Wagner

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A woman is murdered at the home of Gunnery Sergeant Holt Perkins, and while the victim is initially assumed to be the marine's wife, analysis reveals her to be a convicted thief, presumed to be on the scene as part of a plot to hit Perkins' house. When the agents discover the calling card of notorious terror cell Dragon's Tooth on the body, it becomes clear the murder has been committed as part of a wider agenda, and the team joins forces with the Department of Defence to catch the killer. American drama, starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Cote de Pablo and Pauley Perrette

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A prostitute and what seems to be one of her clients are gunned down in a drive-by shooting, and when it emerges that the would-be John was actually a Navy officer, Gibbs and DiNozzo realise the killings are connected Lex Tarlionas, an incomplete operation to bring justice to those responsible for an attack on a US airport in 1979, which left 100 people dead. The main suspect is a former Colombian drugs kingpin known as Tomas Orlando, and the murdered sex worker was about to hand over crucial DNA evidence that could have connected him to the crime, but now that she is dead, Gibbs and the others must find another way to finally bring Orlando in. American drama, starring Mark Harmon and David McCallum

programme.title: Criminals: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: Met Police helicopter India 99 is called to help rescue a woman who jumped into the Thames near the Palace of Westminster, as well as her two daughters, who leapt in after her. Elsewhere, the helicopter team coordinates a risky game of cat-and-mouse as police chase a group of graffiti artists across live train tracks in a patch of industrial wasteland in Battersea. The episode also looks at the case of the Hounslow Slasher, a man who in 2012 randomly attacked lone women while they were travelling home at night. Nick Wallis presents

programme.desc: A teacher's body is found in the boot of her car. Suspicions that she was having an affair are soon confirmed, but the case takes a sinister turn when the trail leads to her husband and fanatical father-in-law. Jerry Orbach stars

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: When a wealthy art patron is found murdered and her body mutilated, the team's inquiries lead to failed painter Larry Brunig, who objected to the obscene nature of the art supported and promoted by the victim - and a probe into his past reveals a violent history

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Animal rights activists are implicated in the death of an Aids researcher killed by a bite from an infected monkey, and use the ensuing court case to drum up support for their cause. As events unfold, McCoy and Carmichael find themselves debating ethics with lawyers who argue the protection of animal life is a valid defence in a murder case

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A woman's body is found in a Central Park lake during a Puerto Rican Day parade. The victim turns out to be the wife of a powerful billionaire, and pressure is put on the police to find the culprit quickly. Suspicion falls on the business partner of the victim's husband and a witness comes forward to identify him, making everything seem clear cut - but not for long

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A restaurant owner is beaten to death and Briscoe and Green's investigation leads them to a gang of thrill-seeking teenagers who tried to steal from the victim but ended up killing him. The ensuing case leaves McCoy with a dilemma over whether the accused are old enough to face the death penalty

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The officers investigate the death of a man on a cruise ship whose body was discovered in the ship's sauna by McGee's mother-in-law

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A Navy reservist's body is found in a beat-up car at the end of a gun range. Kasie weighs the pros and cons of buying a gun

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: When a leading financial advisor is shot dead at a naval station, NCIS investigates by interviewing the victim's 3D hologram of herself, which she created before her death

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The team travels to Houston to search for a serial rapist who has resurfaced to attack his previous victims again, while Prentiss undergoes therapy on her return to work, in a bid to deal with her past trauma

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson puts herself in danger when a home invasion escalates into a hostage situation

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A high-school rape accusation escalates into a complicated 'he-said-she-said' debacle, and with no conclusive or satisfactory resolution on the horizon, it becomes unclear what - if anything - has taken place. Meanwhile, getting embroiled in an ugly legal battle threatens the futures of two promising students. Legal drama, starring Mariska Hartigay

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: DiNozzo teams up with his girlfriend, ATF agent Zoe Keates, to investigate the circumstances surrounding the death of a US Marine in what initially seems like a simple road accident. The team reveals the dead man did indeed die due to a broken neck sustained during a crash, but someone shot at him first. As DiNozzo and Keates pursue their inquiry, they discover the victim's death is connected to a controversial ATF plan to place traceable firearms in the criminal system, and then follow them to the heads of crime organisations. Naval crime drama, starring Michael Weatherly

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A US marine visits the home of his former captain, only to find the man has been killed, and the killer is waiting inside the property. While the soldier escapes with his life, the attacker gets away too. It quickly emerges the prime suspect is Qasim, an Afghan translator evidence, and evidence points against him, until it is discovered he has a brother, who is loyal to the Taliban. The subsequent chain of evidence leads Gibbs and Bishop to Afghanistan

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A Naval intelligence ensign is killed in an unusual car accident. Gibbs and his team are reunited with old friend Ned Dorneget, who is now working with NCIS cyber operations, and NSA attorney Jake Malloy to investigate the case, and discover a conspiracy involving terrorist recruitment on the internet

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Special Agent Ned Dorneget of the NCIS cyber division joins the team to further their investigation into The Calling, the insidious terror network radicalising youngsters via the internet. When it emerges young suicide bomber Bradley was not, in fact, affiliated with The Calling, Gibbs and his colleagues realise they might be back to square-one. Determined to bring the organisation down, the agents pursue two new leads, an arms dealer who may be supplying The Calling with their signature German S-mines, and another boy given a deadly mission by the terrorists. Guest starring Matt Jones

programme.title: Criminals: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: A one-off edition of the documentary in which journalist Nick Wallis reveals how CCTV and technological advances are helping to ensure convictions, focusing on criminals in London involved in robberies, thefts, drug crimes, street brawls and weapons offences. In Soho, police officers monitor the activity of the area's 100,000 nightly visitors from a CCTV control room in an underground bunker, while in Lambeth the air support unit is called in when an armed gang are seen rampaging through the streets

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The unit uncovers a secret dog-fighting ring, which leads to an unexpected move by one of the team members and sends Gibbs past his breaking-point. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon, Sean Murray and Wilmer Valderrama

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Vance assigns McGee, Torres and Bishop to Covid compliance duty at a foreign affairs summit, where they discover a link to another NCIS team's murder case. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon, Sean Murray and Wilmer Valderrama

programme.title: Entertainment News on 5
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Evidence from the stabbing of a Marine sergeant leads Torres to meet his father, Miguel who left when he was a child. Pam Dawber and Steven Bauer guest star, with Mark Harmon and Wilmer Valderrama

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green investigate the discovery of a prostitute's body behind a rubbish bin. As inquiries get under way, they uncover a seedy case involving the shipping of illegal immigrants, police corruption and virtual sex

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green investigate the strangulation of a college graduate who moonlighted as a stripper to pay off her fees, and learn that the girl's death is linked to insider trading involving a former porn star and her mentor. Jerry Orbach stars

programme.title: Entertainment News on 5
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The relatives of a wealthy woman found in a coma come under suspicion when the team investigates her subsequent death. It later transpires she was suffering from a degenerative disease, and the theory of a possible mercy killing crumbles when the family's affairs, both financial and sexual, come to light. David Dukes guest stars

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green investigate the case of a gay man beaten to death during the abduction of his adopted infant son. At first they suspect the victim's wealthy partner may be complicit in the crime - until information about the child's birth mother and homophobic biological father prompts them to pursue a different line of inquiry

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A pregnant loan officer is found murdered in the boot of her car and the trail leads to drugs and a professional basketball player, whose ties to the victim appear to extend beyond the financial deal she approved for him. Detective drama, with Jerry Orbach and Steven Hill

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green investigate the suspicious death of a reality TV contestant. They discover the show's producers had been provoking bad feeling toward the dead man among his fellow participants, while a cameraman reveals that his last moments were captured on film. However, the incriminating tape cannot be found. Jerry Orbach and Steven Hill star

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The officers are called in when Chief Warrant Officer Rafi Nazar is suspected of trying to sell stolen classified Navy software used to pilot combat drones

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team arrive on a civilian research vessel in the North Atlantic that has picked up a few wounded officers, but are forced to hide after discovering terrorists are on board

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The body of a Navy lieutenant is discovered missing an eye, leading NCIS team into the world of cage fighting

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: It's Halloween in New York and when a knife-wielding attacker dressed as Baron Samedi - the Haitian Spirit of Death - stabs a man dressed as a priest, Danny's investigation leads him into the world of voodoo. Elsewhere, Frank helps Garrett Moore when he is targeted by extortionists, Jamie becomes involved in the welfare of a volatile psychiatric patient, and Erin and Nicky take Jack and Sean trick-or-treating

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The team investigates when Libby Parker is followed home by a gang of teenagers, and raped in the courtyard of her apartment block. Hundreds of windows overlooked the scene of the crime, but not one of the residents who witnessed the attack called the police. The prosecutors face an even more difficult dilemma when it emerges none of Libby's neighbours are willing to make a statement either. Crime drama, starring Mariska Hartigay

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Notorious serial killer Gregory Williams Yeats concocts an elaborate plan to free himself from incarceration by co-operating with one-time nemesis Dr Carl Rudnick. When the pair ultimately break out of prison, Chicago detectives Lindsay and Dawson head to New York on the trail of fugitives, and the SVU team is enlisted to help bring the pair back to justice. The first of a two-part cross-over episode with Chicago PD, guest starring Sophia Bush and Jon Seda

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The death of Special Agent Ned Dorneget hits the team hard, and when Gibbs receives a visit from his late colleague's mother - CIA Officer Joanna Teague - he must decide whether to let her help with the investigation into the Calling. Meanwhile, Gibbs hopes his young charge Luke, formerly one of the Calling's radicalised footsoldiers, might be key to bringing the organisation down. However, when the terrorists discover where their defecting comrade has taken refuge, the abduct him and flee to Iraq. The team follows hot on their heels, but it seems Luke's ties to the Calling might be stronger than anyone at NCIS ever anticipated. Naval crime drama, starring Mark Harmon, with guest Mimi Rogers

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs fights for his life on board a US Navy hospital ship after being shot. Meanwhile, DiNozzo and Joanna Teague head for Shanghai, where they hope to take down the leaders of the terrorist group known as The Calling. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Mimi Rogers

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs throws himself back into his work following his near-death experience, updating his appearance and tackling a new risky case alongside DEA agent Luis Mitchell, who wants help bringing down a drugs cartel. Concerned about his colleague's apparent enthusiasm to re-enter the field, DiNozzo discovers Mitchell is the son of a former NCIS agent who gave his life trying to save Gibbs' late wife and daughter, and this attachment is causing Gibbs to break his own rule against personal involvement in a case. However, a significant danger is posed by Benson Long, the cartel's head, and Mitchell's top target

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A US Marine is found murdered in Quantico, mere hours after calling Gibbs to discuss a possible case. In response, Bishop and McGee go undercover as a married couple to run surveillance on a lieutenant and his wife, who may be connected to the death. Starring Mark Harmon, Emily Wickersham and Michael Weatherly

programme.title: Criminals: Caught on Camera

Plus, control room operative Chris is on the lookout for regular shoplifters in Woking, while mild-mannered Jo foils a gang of thieves in Huntingdonshire

programme.desc: Documentary following members of the New Zealand highway patrol as they witness some of the best and worst behaviour on the nation's motorways. programme.desc: Documentary following members of the New Zealand highway patrol as they witness some of the best and worst behaviour on the nation's motorways. programme.title: William and Mary
programme.desc: Terence's absence is proving difficult for Mary, who decides to visit him at his dad's in Brighton. Comedy, starring Julie Walters, Ian Charleson and Stratford Johns

programme.desc: Amelia shares the news of her engagement with Arthur and Jaggers, who both warn her not to rush into things with Compeyson - but their words only make her more determined. Honoria comes to terms with letting Hawdon go, while Bucket is running out of reasons for keeping Fagin in prison

programme.title: Grand Tours of the Scottish Islands
programme.desc: Paul Murton tours Outer Orkney, beginning at North Ronaldsay, which may be the most northerly of the Orkneys but turns out to be surprisingly easy to get to. Paul then hops across to Papa Stronsay, which is now populated by an order of monks who have chosen to make this isolated island their home, and ends on the island of Stroma in the Pentland Firth, a previously inhabited island that was abandoned in the 1950s. One of the last people to live there joins Paul to recall when it was still a thriving community

programme.title: Grand Tours of the Scottish Islands
programme.desc: Paul Murton visits the islands of Coll and Tiree, which though just a few miles apart could not be more different. On Coll, he meets Nicolas Maclean Bristol, owner of Breachacha Castle, who can trace his ancestors on the island back to the 14th century. Tiree is one of the stormiest places in Europe, but is also one of the best places in Britain to surf and practise the relatively new sport of sand yachting, the racing of go-carts with a sail along the beach

programme.title: Monkey
programme.desc: The pilgrims come face to face with a deadly swarm of locusts led by the Demon Queen Grasshopper, which Monkey needs to stop before everyone is turned into pigs

programme.title: Space 1999
programme.desc: Part two of two. Koenig battles to halt the infiltration of Moonbase Alpha by dastardly alien beings. Sci-fi adventure, starring Martin Landau

programme.title: Lost Lagoon (1957)
programme.desc: A man lost at sea in a tropical storm ends up stuck on a desert island with a strange woman, and decides to let the rest of the world think he is dead so they can start a new life together. However, his plans are jeopardised when an insurance investigator comes looking for him. Drama, starring Jeffrey Lynn and Leila Barry

programme.title: After the Ball (1957)
programme.desc: Musical biopic of Music Hall singer and male impersonator Vesta Tilley, starring Pat Kirkwood and Laurence Harvey

programme.title: The Real Eastenders
programme.desc: Six-part series chronicling the history of the East End over 200 years, as revealed through the experiences of its culturally influential inhabitants, aiming to show how its colourful past remains a vibrant force in the lives of both celebrities and ordinary Londoners. The first programme tells the stories of people trying to break away from the area, including soccer player Ronnie Gould, recently signed by Leyton Orient, who harbours dreams of playing for West Ham and, eventually, England

programme.desc: Fact-based drama, starring Timothy Spall and Brenda Blethyn as the parents of a woman with mental health difficulties. When their daughter's hostile behaviour and the authorities' lack of support become too much to handle, the couple decide to commit suicide together, writing a letter to a local newspaper to explain the reasons behind their actions. The cast also includes Rebekah Staton and Judy Flynn

programme.desc: A Londoner signs up to join an auxiliary fire service in the East End during the Second World War. He and his fellow volunteers encounter resentment from the regular fire brigade, but gradually, the professionals come to realise they cannot keep the city safe without the amateurs' help. Ealing comedy drama, starring Tommy Trinder, James Mason, Mervyn Johns and William Hartnell

programme.title: Grand Tours of the Scottish Islands
programme.desc: Paul Murton experiences island life. On Harris and Lewis, he tries weaving Harris Tweed and meets the family behind the Stornoway black pudding

programme.title: Grand Tours of the Scottish Islands
programme.desc: Paul Murton visits the Uists and Benbecula, a chain of low-lying islands 30 miles from mainland Scotland, and his journey sees him try his hand at fishing for wild sea trout. He also finds out how South Uist became a missile testing base and discovers the secrets of the deserted tidal island of Vallay

programme.title: Kate Humble: Off the Beaten Track
programme.desc: In south Wales, Kate and Teg set a mountain alight and experience the heat of a controlled burn with the local fire service in an area with the highest incidence of wild fires in the whole of the UK. Kate gets the creative juices flowing by lending a hand to the creation of an epic land art piece - a 30ft mandala - a stunning geometrically patterned circle made entirely from natural materials. Teg gets a run for her money, when meeting film actors at a rural Film Academy for Animals, and Kate fulfils her childhood dream with a master farrier, learning how to shoe a horse

programme.title: Big City Life
programme.desc: Documentary following a group of West Ham FC fans who have formed friendships by wearing colourful shirts when they support their team in the stands

programme.title: Reg ()
programme.desc: In June 2003, Lance Corporal Tom Keys was among six military policemen killed by a mob in the Shia city of Majar al-Kabir in southern Iraq. Angered by his belief and the growing public feeling that the war with Iraq was based on a lie, Tom's father Reg forms pressure group Military Families Against the War and decides to stand against prime minister Tony Blair in his home constituency of Sedgefield in the 2005 general election. Fact-based drama, starring Tim Roth and Anna Maxwell Martin

programme.title: Way Upstream (1987)
programme.desc: Two business partners and their wives take a trip in a cabin cruiser up a river. The festering resentments among the group are stirred further by a handsome stranger, who is soon taking over as captain of the vessel. Comedy based on Alan Aykbourn's stage play, starring Nick Dunning, Joanne Pearce, Barrie Rutter and Marion Bailey

programme.title: Nutcracker (1982)
programme.desc: A Russian ballerina defects to the West, and is drawn into a web of intrigue when she joins a London company run by a powerful, possessive woman. Drama, starring Joan Collins, Paul Nicholas and Finola Hughes

programme.desc: Alexander Armstrong and Richard Osman present a Formula One-themed edition of the general knowledge quiz, challenging stars associated with the sport to come up with the least likely correct answers to a series of questions posed to members of the public. programme.title: The Open Live
programme.desc: Live coverage of the first day of the tournament, which takes place at Royal Liverpool Golf Club in Hoylake, Merseyside. This is the 13th time overall that the prestigious competition has been held on this course, and the first time since 2014, when Rory McIlroy claimed the third of his four Major titles. A total of 156 qualifying players will make up the initial field of competitors, including 2022 champion Cameron Smith, who currently plies his trade on the LIV Tour
